RITUAL.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yStrength at the beginning of your turn.

WITHER.DESCRIPTION: Permanently decrease this card's power by the wither amount. When it reaches #b0, the card becomes #yDepleted. Can be replenished at Rest Sites.

INSPIRATION.DESCRIPTION: An unplayable status card. When drawn, it #yExhausts and draws #b2 more cards.

RESPITE.DESCRIPTION: An unplayable status card. Heals #b2 HP at the end of your turn.

PSALM.DESCRIPTION: A 0-cost attack card that deals #b3 damage to ALL enemies and has #yWither #b2.

STICK.DESCRIPTION: A 0-cost skill card that increases Stick Smack damage and returns a Stick Smack to your hand.

ENTANGLED.DESCRIPTION: You cannot play #yAttack cards for one turn.

REGRET.DESCRIPTION: An unplayable curse card. While in your hand, lose #b1 HP for each card in your hand at the end of the turn.

BLEED.DESCRIPTION: Deals damage at the end of the round. Does not decrease over time.
